LanguageData.Arrow_Compound.label: carbon arrow
LanguageData.Bow_Compound.label: compound bow
LanguageData.Bow_Compound.description: A modern compound bow. Fires a high velocity arrow fast.
LanguageData.Bullet_Blowgun.label: dart
LanguageData.Gun_Blowgun.label: blowgun
LanguageData.Gun_Blowgun.description: A simple weapon consisting of a narrow, long tube for firing light projectiles or darts. While dart itself is not so lethal, it has poison on the tip.
LanguageData.Bullet_ThrowingAxes.label: throwing axe
LanguageData.Gun_ThrowingAxes.label: throwing axes
LanguageData.Gun_ThrowingAxes.description: Metal forged throwing axes. In the trained hands, these can be a devastating tool both in melee and ranged combat.
LanguageData.Gun_ThrowingAxes.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.Gun_ThrowingAxes.tools.1.label: edge
LanguageData.Bullet_ThrowingClubs.label: throwing club
LanguageData.Gun_ThrowingClubs.label: throwing clubs
LanguageData.Gun_ThrowingClubs.description: The one of the first ranged weapons used by early humans, throwing club can be used in both melee and ranged attack.
LanguageData.Gun_ThrowingClubs.tools.0.label: handle
